WalletAccessRequiredDesc: Access wallet using your private key, keystore file or kaikas
ConfirmLogoutOrRefreshTitle: Do you really want to clear your private key from your browser?
ConfirmLogoutOrRefreshDesc: This action will delete your private key and transaction data stored in your browser's storage. You'll need to safe your private key to check your balance or send KLAY/token
AccessWalletMenuDesc: Please access your Wallet to start klay exchange.
WrongPassword: Does not match with your keystore file.
InsufficientKlayBalance: Insufficient KLAY balance to use tx fee
ApproveTokenDesc: By approving this action, you grant permission for this contract to access your wallet for your request.
SwapTxNotice: Price is dependent on your swap value. There is a 1% difference between the expected and the actual quantity.
Name: Name
ApproveTxNotice: You need to confirm Approve transaction. By approving this action, you grant permission for this contract to access your wallet for request. After confirm this action, please try again your original request.
InitPoolTxNotice: The initial exchange rate will be set based on the first deposits.
WalletKeyOrPrivateKey: Klaytn Wallet Key or Private Key
WalletKeyOrPrivateKeyLabel: Enter the Klaytn Wallet Key or Private Key
FirstDepositDesc:
The initial exchange rate will be set based on your deposits.
Please make sure that your KLAY and deposits have the same fiat value.
AlreadyCreatedExchange: Pool about this token already created.,
AccessToKaikasTitle: You can swap using kaikas on your browser.
AccessToKaikasDescription: If you want to access the wallet with kaikas, click the access button.
NotInstalledKaikas: Unable to connect to kaikas. Please Install Kaikas on your browser to proceed.
NotSupportedBrowserUseToKaikas:
Kaikas is only available in browser that support chrome extension
(Chrome, Whale, Microsoft Edge, etc.)
OnlyAvailableInMainNet:
Klay exchange is only available on klaytn mainnet.
Please change the network in your kaikas.
OnlyCreateErc20Token: You only can create pool about ERC-20 based token.
NeedInstallKaikas: kaikas in not installed. check the notice on left side.
